Title: XAML Inspector
Description: XAML inspector is a cross platform visual debugger for XAML apps. Simply add the nuget package to inspect the visual tree, properties, resources and styles.
HomeWiki:
Introduction

XAML inspector is a cross platform visual debugger for XAML apps.

You can find all details about the project at www.xamlinspector.com

Alpha Preview of XAML Inspector available

https://www.nuget.org/packages/XamlInspector/
